title: Day 283: Mattathias Attacks (2022)
author: Ascension

itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike clarifies the meaning behind Mattathias' zealous attack against the Greeks and his fellow Jews who were not obeying God's laws. From our reading of Sirach, Fr.
